title: Circular AON: A Very Fast Scheme to Protect Encrypted Data Against Key Exposure
abstract:
In this poster, we introduce CAON: a novel variation of an all-ornothing transform that aims at protecting encrypted data against exposure of cryptographic material.We improve the fastest relevant scheme by reducing the number of exclusive-or operations made in addition to encryption by almost a half. We believe that CAON can be easily integrated inside modern distributed storage systems or multi-cloud data solutions in order to reinforce confidentiality level of the stored data at the cost of a very small performance overhead.

------endofabstract------414
